Name: Dragon Turtle Wyrmling
Traits: Amphibious. The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.
Actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage. Steam Breath (Recharge 5â€“6). The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.
